Subject: Theatre Studies
SectionHeaderContent: This report provides sample answers or an indication of what answers may have included. Unless otherwise stated, these are not intended to be exemplary or complete responses.

Subject: Theatre Studies
SectionHeaderContent: The statistics in this report may be subject to rounding resulting in a total more or less than 100 per cent.

Subject: Theatre Studies
SectionHeaderContent: The 2025 Theatre Studies written examination consisted of three sections (A, B and C). Section A consisted of two questions and Sections B and C consisted of one question each. The focus of Section A was on previously unseen material that related to The Tempest by William Shakespeare, while the focus of Sections B and C was on plays seen and studied for Outcome 3 in Units 3 and 4. In the centre of the examination paper was a detachable Insert that provided information intended to be used to answer Section A.
